data.title: Wipro Limited Switzerland Great Place to Work Switzerland
data.meta_description: Wipro Limited Switzerland - Enterprises are balancing the demand for transformation and innovation with the need to focus on their core business. Managing these aspects – along with existential factors such as scalability, cost optimization, and service quality enhancement...
data.text:
What defines us

We are a purpose-driven organization that has reinvented itself over its 75+ years of existence. We drive change for ourselves, our industry, and our clients. We pride ourselves on our technology capability. What we pride ourselves on even more is our commitment to make a difference in society. A full 66% of Wipro Limited’s profits are pledged towards philanthropy, helping the most marginalized people across the world.

The “Spirit of Wipro” guides our behaviour, promoting our 5 habits: Being Respectful, Being Responsive, Always Communicating, Demonstrating Stewardship, and Building Trust. These habits are the foundation of our company culture. The habits promote an entrepreneurial outlook that encourages all employees to surface new ideas and drive impactful initiatives. Our diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences spark our team’s innovation. Combine all that with the learning platforms and tools available in the organization, and this creates a culture of excellence like no other.

What inspires us

We are inspired by the rapid pace of technology. Our leaders deeply understand the need to invest in technology-driven change. Innovation is a way of life in Wipro. We innovate not just in technology products and client projects, but also in our workplace. Our dedicated labs deliver new approaches and ideas. We invest in start-ups and provide some of the best crowdsourcing platforms to our people. This dynamic environment provides numerous opportunities for our employees to learn new skills, work on the latest technologies, and be rewarded for creating impact.
